resources.string: Choose a contact with mobile number to which you would like to receive the message.
Tick the check box to start sending SMS text to selected contact.
Type in the message to be sent via SMS to the selected contact.
To change your current passcode, please enter your current Pass code and new Pass code.
Removes selected contact, stops the service and removes the saved message.
"%1$s do not have a mobile number."
Passcode entered is wrong. Please retry.
Passcode does not match. Please enter same passcode in both fields.
Read permissions for your contacts is required to choose a contact. Please Change the app permissions.
Send SMS permissions is required to send message. Please Change the app permissions.
This will clear all your settings including selected contact and stopping the service.\n\nWould you like to reset?
Please enter your Old Pass Code.
Please enter your New Pass Code.
Please enter different New Pass Code.
New Pass Code do not match.
Old Pass Code is not correct.
